name: Cover Fossil
rules: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Tirtouga you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Eviolite
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is a Basic Pokémon, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: N
rules: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Plume Fossil
rules: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Archen you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rocky Helmet
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
rules: Shuffle up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Xtransceiver
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
